oai_dc:dc.dc:title: City Aldermen Vote on Electric Street Lights
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aldermen pass electric street light bill by a vote of ten to four. The vote approves a contract with Brush Electric Light Company for two hundred lights.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville, Tenn.
